content.question: Emersonâ€™s remarks in the excerpt most directly reflected which of the following developments during the early nineteenth century?

choices.label: The emergence of a national culture

content.answer: The emergence of a national culture

topic.text: 4.9: The Development of an American Culture

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
